I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.

participant_2.background:
I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.
I am an international business man in my early 40s.
my favorite truck is a chevy duramax.
i only sleep 3 hours a day.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.

content.text: I have a busy lifestyle that I am trying to get a better hold of.
What is something that you like doing that you forget to do because you are so busy?
I forget to take care of myself and the things I want to do for myself because I am so busy with work.
I see, what do you do for work?
I work retail and I love it, but the hours can be long and tiring.
I can imagine. What is your favorite part of your job?
I love interacting with my customers and helping them find what they need.
That sounds great! What is something you have always wanted to do but haven't had the chance to?
I have always wanted to travel the world, but I haven't had the time or money.
There are some great ways to travel on a budget, you should look into it!
I will, thanks for the advice.
No problem, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go for walks in the park, and read.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests and hobbies, that's great!
I try to keep busy, I don't like to sit around and do nothing.
That's good, I like to keep busy too.
